items.content:
Senior Salesforce Developer at Pivotal

Remote

Location: USA, Remote

About Us

Pivotal Software, Inc. combines platform, tools, and methodology to help the world’s largest companies transform the way they build software and run their most strategic applications. Our technology is used by Global 2000 companies and developers to give software development and IT operations a strategic advantage. Founded in 2013, Pivotal unleashes software-developer productivity and creates an environment for innovation to scale, while fulfilling our mission to transform how the world builds software.

You

You’ve been working with Salesforce as a business platform for several years and love the flexibility of the platform and using it to create elegant, functional solutions for complex business problems. You enjoy the challenge of understanding existing customizations and refactoring to make existing solutions even better. You also understand that there are many ways to solve the same problem and can collaboratively work towards the best design for the situation. We expect you to jump in when you see something that needs doing and raise your hand if you need help. You’ve got a great sense of humor, are empathetic, and enjoy innovating with your team and having fun while doing it.

Us

The IT team enables Pivotal to solve real business problems. We provide technology, systems, and solutions to allow our employees to work faster, better, and smarter all around the globe. We strive for agility, transparency, and transformation in our encounters, while ensuring data responsibility and security are top of mind in every process and interaction. The Business Enablement team uses proven Pivotal methodology to create custom solutions and integrations for our SaaS business applications – Salesforce, Zuora, OpenAir, Workday and others.

Your Day

You are responsible for designing, implementing and deploying customizations and integrations for our Salesforce Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Community, Analytics and Sales Quoting systems using Test Driven Development practices. You are experienced with balancing the declarative configuration of SaaS applications with custom extensions. You will partner with our release manager on internal release management, source control and test automation systems, striving for continuous integration and use of the Pivotal agile methodologies and products. You will work closely with Operations, Finance, Support and IT to meet specific business objectives in support of company priorities.

Required Skills / Experiences:

  • 5+ years relevant experience
  • Strong experience managing, designing, configuring, customizing and integrating Salesforce CRM
  • Solid Force.com development experience, with a strong focus on Apex, Lightning Components and Visualforce
  • Interest in Test Driven Development (TDD) and agile/XP methodologies
  • Self-starter requiring minimal direction for research and knowledge transfer
  • The ability to develop creative, scalable solutions to problems, complex and mundane
  • Strong teamwork skills, with the ability to work virtually and independently as required
  • Experience working with globally distributed sites and groups
  • Demonstrated ability to communicate inside and outside the organization, both verbally and in writing

Desired Skills / Experiences:

  • Salesforce Developer Certification preferred
  • BS degree in IT, Engineering, MIS or Computer Science preferred
  • Managing, designing, configuring, customizing and integrating SaaS Quoting systems such as Zuora
  • Integration experience with enterprise middleware such as Cast Iron or Dell Boomi, and SOAP, REST and streaming APIs
  • Familiarity with web application development technologies such as Javascript, JSON, HTML5 and CSS helpful
Apply for job

Job description

You will be doing

  • development on FieldAware's hybrid NetSuite application, which sits on AWS and NetSuite
  • understand requirements and developing end-to-end solutions using both SuiteTalk and SuiteScript v2.
  • managing releases from requirements, to QA and to eventual deployment
  • write tests and enhance our deployment pipeline

What we require from you

  • experience in creating design specifications from user requirements; it is not accidental this skill is first, we place great value in verbal and writing skills
  • experience in developing NetSuite solutions individually and as part of a wider team
  • passion for javascript and web technologies
  • be a git master, have experience in developing software one commit at a time and deploying software one release a time
  • experience in cloud apis, both REST-ful and SOAP-based
  • tech buzzwords we are using, NS SDF, NS SuiteScript v2, NS Workflow Engine, NS SuiteTalk, Python 3, Unit testing SuiteScript 2.0 code using https://github.com/3EN-Cloud/netsumo, NS Suitelets, NS Custom Fields, NS Custom Records, NS Advanced Inventory, NS Order Management, NS Sales and Purchasing

What we have worked in the last quarter

  • Integrated NetSuite Projects with FieldAware Jobs
  • Migrated from AWS Lambda to a Docker environment
  • Switched databases from DynamodDB to PostgresQL
Apply now

About FieldAware Ltd

We are re-shaping the field service industry! Our made-for-mobile, cloud-based software was designed from the ground up to provide ease of use with incredible flexibility – a combination that enables field service organizations to amaze their customers, astonish the staff and surprise the competition. Our software was architected as a mobile platform, with no incumbent legacy technologies to modify or migrate from.

Based on our founders’ intimate knowledge of the unique needs of engineers and technicians in the field – and the operational personnel and management that support them – FieldAware is focused on providing field service organizations, both large and small, with:

Intelligence about your Customers: So you can increase revenue, expand into new markets, differentiate your services and create customer advocates.

Intelligence about your Business: That enables you to increase the productivity of your staff (and keep them happy!), use company resources more efficiently, simplify your business processes and “right size” your parts and repair inventory.

We combine our software with the industry’s best implementation, on-boarding and support services enabling companies to take full and rapid advantage of today’s mobile environment. 

Benefits

  • Work from Home
  • International and Diverse Team
  • Agile Development Environment
